text_chunks.text: Supplemental Information - Total Wireless Operating and Financial Statistics
text_chunks.original: Supplemental Information - Total Wireless Operating and Financial Statistics
text_chunks.label: section_header

text_chunks.text: The following supplemental schedule contains certain financial and operating metrics which reflect an aggregation of our Consumer and Business segments' wireless results.
text_chunks.original: The following supplemental schedule contains certain financial and operating metrics which reflect an aggregation of our Consumer and Business segments' wireless results.
text_chunks.label: text

text_chunks.text: Statistics presented as of end of period.
text_chunks.original: (1)  Statistics presented as of end of period.
text_chunks.label: list_item

text_chunks.text: Wireless retail postpaid ARPA - average service revenue per account from retail postpaid accounts.
text_chunks.original: (2)  Wireless retail postpaid ARPA - average service revenue per account from retail postpaid accounts.
text_chunks.label: list_item

text_chunks.text: Wireless retail prepaid ARPU - average service revenue per unit from retail prepaid connections.
text_chunks.original: (3)  Wireless retail prepaid ARPU - average service revenue per unit from retail prepaid connections.
text_chunks.label: list_item

text_chunks.text: Intersegment transactions between Consumer or Business segment with corporate entities have not been eliminated.
text_chunks.original: (4)  Intersegment transactions between Consumer or Business segment with corporate entities have not been eliminated.
text_chunks.label: list_item

text_chunks.text: Where applicable, the operating results reflect certain adjustments, including those related to the 3G network shutdowns, migration activity among different types of devices and plans, customer profile changes, and adjustments in connection with mergers, acquisitions and divestitures.
text_chunks.original: Where applicable, the operating results reflect certain adjustments, including those related to the 3G network shutdowns, migration activity among different types of devices and plans, customer profile changes, and adjustments in connection with mergers, acquisitions and divestitures.
text_chunks.label: text
